Class DeferredShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.coreengine.rendering.programs.Shader
      • de.coreengine.rendering.programs.DeferredShader

  • public class DeferredShader
extends Shader
    Representing the shader for the deferred light rendering with a gbuffer
    Author:
    Darius Dinger
